DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Causes entity to visit Civilian Visit Points if they are nearby.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>visitTime</myVariableName> <myType>double</myType> <myLabel>Visit Time (s)</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>10</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>1</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>maxVisitDistance</myVariableName> <myType>range</myType> <myLabel>Max Visit Distance</myLabel> <myToolTip>Maximum distance from which to deviate from normal movement to visit an interst point.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>10</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>1</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>visitLiklihood</myVariableName> <myType>integer</myType> <myLabel>Visit Liklihood (%)</myLabel> <myToolTip>Percent liklihood that an entity will choose to visit a point that it passes near.</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>30</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>reactivetask_priority</myVariableName> <myType>integer</myType> <myLabel>Visit Liklihood (%)</myLabel> <myToolTip>The priority of this reactive task</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>10</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>0</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>1</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>reactivetask_enabled</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Visit Liklihood (%)</myLabel> <myToolTip>Whether or not this reactive task is enabled</myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>0</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>0</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>1</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
